column7: The most international student place in Lund!
column9: The most international student place in Lund! Friendly and warm atmosphere. Well organised student activities.

On a pleasant enough Tuesday evening, my friends and I decided it was time for a refreshing beverage to break up the arduous schedule of studying. 

HOWEVER, we were treated to unfathomable mistreatment by our, so called ‘hosts’. My gang and I entered, filled with...More
